protein.specific_function: Promotes absorption of the essential vitamin cobalamin (Cbl) in the ileum by specific receptor-mediated endocytosis

reference.reference_text: Hewitt JE, Gordon MM, Taggart RT, Mohandas TK, Alpers DH: Human gastric intrinsic factor: characterization of cDNA and genomic clones and localization to human chromosome 11. Genomics. 1991 Jun;10(2):432-40.
